title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Laboratory experiments and exercises on Measurement of Ergonomic variables for Short and Long Cycle Jobs, Work Capacity Measurements, Anthropometry, Work Posture and Human Machine Interface Analysis, Rating Films exercises, Time Study of selected Jobs and MTM applications.
